title: ASP.NET Core MVC Extensions Library
description: ASP.NET Core MVC Extensions Library provides addtional tag helpers and utility for simplify ASP.NET Core web application development.

packOptions.summary: This project adds support for enum based selector, checkbox, select option labels, conditional class tags, and other useful addtional tag helpers to simplify ASP.NET Core web application development.
packOptions.releaseNotes: Fix a bug that authorization tag helper does not generate the root element.
